name: alrev-intl
author: pointnet
description: This repository is the home of Alrev.Intl and related packages.

scripts.cldr-plural-rules: cd scripts && dotnet tool run dotnet-script .\cldr-plural-rules.csx ..\packages\Alrev.Intl.PluralRules\ -nm ..\node_modules\ -na Alrev.Intl.PluralRules
scripts.cldr-relative-time: cd scripts && dotnet tool run dotnet-script .\cldr-relative-time.csx ..\packages\Alrev.Intl.RelativeTime\ -nm ..\node_modules\ -na Alrev.Intl.RelativeTime
